mapper.select: select ID,channelID,title,cover,description,postedTime from News where channelID =#{channelID} ORDER BY postedTime DESC limit #{limit} offset #{offset};
select ID,channelID,title,cover,description,postedTime from news where title like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' ORDER BY postedTime DESC;
select ID,channelID,title,cover,description,postedTime from news, UserSaved where userID =#{userID} And news.ID = userSaved.newsID;
select * from UserSaved where userID = #{userID} And newsID = #{newsID};
mapper.update: update News set views = #{views}, updatedTime = #{updatedTime} where ID=#{ID};
